name: Gold Coin Reserve (GCR)
short_description: Gold Coin Reserve is a gold backed digital asset that is tethered to the price of gold.
description: Gold Coin Reserve by eMoney Bank is a gold backed digital asset that is tethered to the price of gold. The asset sits at the core of a blockchain infrastructure, dPoS technology, that is utilised by the central banks of the world, with unlimited scalability and economic integration.
